description:
Learn how to become an effective management coach, and inspire leaders and managers within your organisation to achieve their full potential.

This management coaching course is structured so delegates develop an effective understanding of the key principles of coaching. Using videos and quizzes, course participants will learn how to…

  • Defining Coaching
    • What is Coaching?
    • Introducing the GROW Model
  • Setting Goals
    • Goals in the context of GROW
    • Identifying Appropriate Goal Areas
    • Setting SMART Goals
  • Understanding the Reality
    • Getting a Picture of Where You Are
    • Identifying Obstacles
  • Developing Options
    • Identifying Paths
    • Choosing Your Final Approach
  • Wrapping it All Up
    • Creating the Final Plan
    • Identifying the First Step
  • Providing Feedback
    • The Feedback Sandwich
    • Providing Constructive Criticism
    • Encouraging Growth and Development
  • Overcoming Roadblocks
    • Common Obstacles
    • Re-Evaluating Goals
    • Focusing on Progress
  • Reaching the End
    • How to Know When You’ve Achieved Success
title: Coaching Skills: Learn How To Coach Others In 1 Day
